name: 地理統計
goals: Recognize spatial statistics and multivariate data analysis methods.
Apply statistical methods to analyze geographic data.
syllabus:
\[16+2\] weeks

1\. Introduction 

2\. Descriptive Spatial Statistics

3\. Inferential Spatial Statistics

4\. Spatial Autocorrelation

5\. Overview of Multivariate Methods

6\. Multiple Regression

7\. Logistic Regression

8\. Midterm

9\. Exploratory Factor Analysis

10\. Cluster Analysis

11\. Spatial Regression Models

12. Geographically Weighted Regression

13. Final Exam

14\. Final Project Discussion

15\. Final Project Presentation (1)

16\. Final Project Presentation (2)

17\. (Online Self-Learning) Multiple Discriminant Analysis (1)

18. (Online Self-Learning) Multiple Discriminant Analysis (2)
prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
